overlayGrid.title: 2026 Midterm Elections: Democrats and Republicans Battle for Senate Control
overlayGrid.excerpt: With control of the Senate hanging in the balance, both parties are deploying massive resources to key battleground states as the 2026 midterm election cycle officially kicks off.
